snippet.title: Kirby Cosmic Chaos fangame 1st trailer
snippet.description:
(Minon speaking)Something a bit more formal.  This one was originally uploaded at Niconico Douga at http://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm6518548

Yay for online broadcasters and their habit of ruining video quality

(GBAKirbster2007 speaking)
Demo link at the bottom of this, though I'd encourage those unfamiliar with KCCh to read it.

For those who don't know already, Kirby Cosmic Chaos is a Fangame that is striving to do what very few Kirby fangames have done so far, try to replicate and work off of the official games in homage to a series we feel gets far less attention than it deserves.

Hopefully that will all change once Nintendo finally releases a NEW full length Kirby adventure on the Wii (also, buy KSSU for the DS if you haven't already, awesome stuff), but until we can support the purchase of such a wonderful thing (and even after we can and do) we intend to make our personal ideal Kirby game. 

Of course, being made by fans, we have a bit more liberty in what we can put in, hence the Touhou helper cameos of Marisa Kirisame as a Beam Keke and Cirno as an Ice Fairy. There are quite a few more lil shout outs to other franchises(Nintendo and non-nintendo ones) and to other Kirby games that we plan on including via helpers, enemies, abilities, and even bosses,  but we'll be keeping those mostly hush-hush for now. It'd take all the fun out of discovering who and what we put in when you finally get to play through yourselves! ;)
We also have included quite a few new original characters  that are the basis of the story of KCCh, but we'll save introducing them and giving more insight on the story for another time.

One last thing, we just don't have the manpower to make this as pretty or complete it as fast as Nintendo obviously can, so please don't bother us with "NEEDS MOAR POLYGONS" or "WHY ISN'T THIS DONE YET" or "DEMO NOW". Patience is a virtue, and trust me when I say we have a TON planned that we want to put in so that this can be the absolute best Kirby Fangame we can possibly make. Thank you for being considerate..... 
.....and for reading all this. If you did, go pat yourself on the back and have a cookie, YOU'VE EARNED IT! 

Also, since you've had the patience to read this(or at least look over it quick), here's the demo download page: http://sites.google.com/site/azurarokstudio/Home/topeng/--downloads
NCFC is most recent, but it DOES NOT HAVE EVERYTHING SHOWN IN THE TRAILER. We are working on getting a new demo together with a LOT more stuff, but it will take us some time... Expect a new demo hopefully by the next Nintendo Community Fangame Convention, though we also aim to get one earlier by the time of SAGE again.
